update ipbox_project_PERFORMANCE_TARGET
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COURSE_ID = #{courseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRAIN_ID = #{trainId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OVERALL_GOAL = #{overallGoal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ANNUAL_TARGET = #{annualTarget,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRAIN_COMPLETION_RATE = #{trainCompletionRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRIAIN_REMARK = #{triainRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRAIN_ACTUAL_COMPLETION_RATE = #{trainActualCompletionRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HOURS_COMPLETION_RATE = #{hoursCompletionRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HOURS_REMARK = #{hoursRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

PRODUCE_COMPLETION_RATE = #{produceCompletionRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

PRODUCE_ACTUAL_COMPLETION_RATE = #{produceActualCompletionRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

PERFORMANCE_EVALUATION=#{performanceEvaluation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTACHMENT = #{attachment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ipbox_project_PERFORMANCE_TARGET set USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COURSE_ID = #{courseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRAIN_ID = #{trainId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OVERALL_GOAL = #{overallGoal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ANNUAL_TARGET = #{annualTarget,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRAIN_COMPLETION_RATE = #{trainCompletionRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRIAIN_REMARK = #{triainRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRAIN_ACTUAL_COMPLETION_RATE = #{trainActualCompletionRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOURS_COMPLETION_RATE = #{hoursCompletionRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOURS_REMARK = #{hoursRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOURS_ACTUAL_COMPLETION_RATE = #{hoursActualCompletionRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WORK_COMPLETION_RATE = #{workCompletionRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WORK_REMARK = #{workRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WORK_ACTUAL_COMPLETION_RATE = #{workActualCompletionRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCE_COMPLETION_RATE = #{produceCompletionRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCE_REMARK = #{produceRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCE_ACTUAL_COMPLETION_RATE = #{produceActualCompletionRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SATISFACTION_DEGREE = #{satisfactionDegree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SATISFACTION_DEGREE_REMARK = #{satisfactionDegreeRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTUAL_SATISFACTION = #{actualSatisfaction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BENEFIT_REMARK = #{benefitRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTUAL_BENEFIT = #{actualBenefit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BENEFIT = #{benefit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATEDBY = #{updatedby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR}, VERSION = VERSION+1, PERFORMANCE_EVALUATION=#{performanceEvaluation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTACHMENT = #{attachment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from ipbox_project_PERFORMANCE_TARGET T where T.IS_DELETED='N' ORDER BY T.CREATE_TIME,T.ID DESC
mapper.delete:
update ipbox_project_PERFORMANCE_TARGET
UPDATEDBY = #{updatedby,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
VERSION = VERSION+1, IS_DELETED='Y',
WHERE ID=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ANDã€€IS_DELETED='N'
mapper.select: SELECT IP.TRAIN_NUM,IP.PLAN_HOURS, (SELECT COUNT(ITR.USER_ID) FROM IPR_TRAIN_REGISTER ITR WHERE ITR.TRAIN_ID= IT.ID AND ITR.STATUS='02') CXRS, (SELECT SUM(IC.STUDY_HOURS) FROM IPR_COURSE IC JOIN IPR_COURSE_REGISTER ICR ON ICR.COURSE_ID=IC.ID WHERE ICR.TRAIN_ID = IT.ID ) WCXSS, ( SELECT COUNT(ICEE.ID) FROM IPR_COURSE_EFFECT_EVALUA ICEE WHERE ICEE.TRAINING_SUMMARY IS NOT NULL AND ICEE.TRAIN_ID=IT.ID) ZPTJRS, (SELECT COUNT(ICR.USER_ID) FROM IPR_COURSE_REGISTER ICR WHERE ICR.TRAIN_ID=IT.ID AND ICR.SCORE IS NOT NULL) SJCXRS, (SELECT COUNT(ICR.USER_ID) FROM IPR_COURSE_REGISTER ICR WHERE ICR.TRAIN_ID=IT.ID AND ICR.RESULT='1') TGRS, (select IPPT.ATTACHMENT from ipbox_project_PERFORMANCE_TARGET IPPT where IPPT.PROJECT_ID=IP.ID AND IPPT.IS_DELETED='N') ATTACHMENT FROM ipbox_project IP LEFT JOIN IPR_TRAIN IT ON IP.ID=IT.PROJECT_ID WHERE IP.IS_DELETED='N' AND IP.ID=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT UV.REGIONS_CODE REGIONS_CODE, (SELECT IAR.REGIONS_LEVEL FROM ipanther_admin_regions IAR WHERE IAR.REGIONS_CODE=UV.REGIONS_CODE) REGIONS_LEVEL, (SELECT IAR.PARENT_CODE FROM ipanther_admin_regions IAR WHERE IAR.REGIONS_CODE=UV.REGIONS_CODE ) PARENT_CODE, (SELECT IAR.REGIONS_NAME FROM ipanther_admin_regions IAR WHERE IAR.REGIONS_CODE=UV.REGIONS_CODE ) REGIONS_NAME FROM ipbox_project IP JOIN IPR_TRAIN IT ON IP.ID=IT.PROJECT_ID JOIN IPR_COURSE_REGISTER ICR ON ICR.TRAIN_ID=IT.ID AND ICR.SCORE IS NOT NULL JOIN USERVIEW UV ON UV.ID=ICR.USER_ID WHERE IP.IS_DELETED='N' AND IP.ID=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY UV.REGIONS_CODE
mapper.delete:
update ipbox_project_PERFORMANCE_TARGET
VERSION = VERSION+1, IS_DELETED='Y',
WHERE PROJECT_ID=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND IS_DELETED='N'
